objects.text: • BOOSTS GROWTH • ADDS STRENGTH • ENHANCES SHINE

product_details.name: Mamaearth Onion Hair Oil with Onion Oil & Redensyl for Hair Fall Control | Boosts Hair Growth | Adds Strength & Shine | 200 ml
product_details.description: Country of Origin: India. Item part number: 8904417310245. Product Dimensions: 15.5 x 5 x 5 cm; 200 g. Item Weight: 200 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 15.5 x 5 x 5 Centimeters. Net Quantity: 200.0 millilitre. Generic Name: Hair Oil.

banner_details:
This banner features a clean and nature-inspired promotional design centered around a hair care product. A soft green radial gradient background enriched with abstract curves and translucent dots creates a fresh aesthetic. At the center is a white circular area bordered by a dotted green line, housing the product image (`product_image`). Above it, bold layered headings (`heading_1`, `heading_2`) in a dark green tone convey the banner’s main message. Below the circle, a supportive tagline (`subheading`) and a line of feature highlights (`tagline`) emphasize product benefits. On the right side, a bright green circle highlights the pricing (`price`). At the bottom, a rectangular call-to-action button (`cta_button`) with clear typographic text (`cta`) invites user interaction.

**Color Palette:**
- Soft Mint (#E8F5E9)
- Light Green (#C8E6C9)
- Grass Green (#8BC34A)
- Deep Green (#33691E)
- Leafy Green (#689F38)
- Button Green (#558B2F)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image of Mamaearth Onion Hair Oil uses a vibrant and earthy color palette that signifies natural and health-focused branding. Dominant colors include deep maroon (#7B2631) from the onion graphic and label banner, rich green (#7BB955) representing nature and purity, and earthy brown tones (#5E362A) for text elements. The brand logo uses a striking mix of blue (#2C9AB7) and green (#84BD00), which are well-balanced and grab attention. The background remains bright white (#FFFFFF) to highlight the vibrant colors while creating a clean, fresh appeal. These colors are blended with subtle gradients and contrasts, effectively drawing attention to key information.
